<!-- Craftopia Project - Industrial Crafts Reservation Website -->

## Project Overview
Craftopia is a React-based web application for browsing and reserving industrial crafts. The project follows MVC architecture with clean, maintainable, and reusable code.

## Technology Stack
- React 18+ with Vite
- React Router for navigation
- CSS3 for styling
- MVC architecture pattern

## Project Structure
- `/src/models` - Data models and dummy data
- `/src/controllers` - Business logic and data handling
- `/src/views` - Page components
- `/src/components` - Reusable UI components
- `/src/styles` - CSS stylesheets
- `/src/utils` - Helper functions

## Development Guidelines
- Follow MVC pattern strictly
- Create reusable components
- Use functional components with hooks
- Implement responsive design
- Use dummy data until backend is ready
- Write clean, well-documented code

## Next Steps
1. Install Node.js (see SETUP.md)
2. Run `npm install` to install dependencies
3. Run `npm run dev` to start development server
4. Access application at http://localhost:3000
